item.title: How I Learn
item.description: Process for Learning I suck at being consistent. I get distracted easily. Most learning content, I’ve either abandoned or skimmed. There’s very little I’ve actually finished, much less deeply in that scope. For Structured Theory heavy Courses: I watch them while eating food. It’s intriguing. Example: Behavioural Psychology by Robert Sapolsy on Youtube For Structured Technical Content on Udemy or YouTube: Most Youtube content I end up rewatching if I catch something of interest or something of high technical detail that I have to have to implement to understand, I do a code-along with the instructor.
